Description: Fragment (wall). Arabesque pattern. Made of turquoise glazed, crackled and black underglaze pottery.
Bibliographic references: Fortnum 1897 / Descriptive catalogue of the maiolica and enamelled earthenware of Italy, the Persian, Damascus, Rhodian, Hispano-Moresue and some French and other wares in the Ashmolean Museum, Oxford, Fortnum collection (p. 47)
Berti & Tongiorgi 1981 / I bacini ceramici medievali delle chiese di Pisa (p. 109)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Charles Drury Edward Fortnum
